segments.content: This week has been busier than last. In particular, there have been 2 great releases, one of them I was [eagerly waiting for](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1671433559280607235) to hit publish!
segments.sourceMdx: This week has been busier than last. In particular, there have been 2 great releases, one of them I was [eagerly waiting for](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1671433559280607235) to hit publish!
segments.translated_content: 本周比上周更加忙碌。特别是有两个重大发布，其中一个是我[翘首以盼](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1671433559280607235)终于上线的！

segments.content:
* Panda CSS: a very promising CSS-in-JS library
* React-Native 0.72: great improvements, particularly those related to Metro
segments.sourceMdx:
- Panda CSS: a very promising CSS-in-JS library
- React-Native 0.72: great improvements, particularly those related to Metro
segments.translated_content:
- Panda CSS：一个极具前景的CSS-in-JS库
- React-Native 0.72：重大改进，尤其是与Metro相关的优化

segments.content:
* Editing UI for your Markdown files
* UI for MDX components
* Supports static (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR)
* Option for visual editing (live-preview)
* Build with reusable blocks
segments.sourceMdx:
- Editing UI for your Markdown files
- UI for MDX components
- Supports static (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR)
- Option for visual editing (live-preview)
- Build with reusable blocks
segments.translated_content:
- 为Markdown文件提供可视化编辑界面
- 支持MDX组件编辑
- 兼容静态生成(SSG)和服务器端渲染(SSR)
- 可选实时预览编辑功能
- 基于可复用区块构建
或运行 `npx create-tina-app@latest` 后访问 `localhost:3000/admin`

segments.content: Segun Adebayo (creator of Chakra UI) unveils his long-awaited CSS-in-JS library ([trailer](https://twitter.com/thesegunadebayo/status/1669732623994834946)). It offers very great DX, is based on modern CSS features (cascade layers), is performant (static analysis at build time, no runtime, atomic CSS)... In short, it ticks a lot of boxes and is generating a lot of interest. It integrates particularly well with React (JSX style props, React Server Components compatible, etc.), but can also be used with other frameworks.
segments.sourceMdx: Segun Adebayo (creator of Chakra UI) unveils his long-awaited CSS-in-JS library ([trailer](https://twitter.com/thesegunadebayo/status/1669732623994834946)). It offers very great DX, is based on modern CSS features (cascade layers), is performant (static analysis at build time, no runtime, atomic CSS)... In short, it ticks a lot of boxes and is generating a lot of interest. It integrates particularly well with React (JSX style props, React Server Components compatible, etc.), but can also be used with other frameworks.
segments.translated_content: Chakra UI创始人Segun Adebayo发布了这款备受期待的CSS-in-JS库([预告片](https://twitter.com/thesegunadebayo/status/1669732623994834946))。它提供卓越的开发体验，基于现代CSS特性（级联层），性能优异（构建时静态分析、无运行时、原子化CSS）... 简言之，它满足了众多期待并引发广泛关注。该库与React深度集成（支持JSX样式属性、兼容React服务端组件等），同时也适用于其他框架。

segments.content: This is a library to keep a close eye on and one that could well compete with Tailwind: it integrates better with the target frameworks and doesn't force you to use a lengthy `className`.
segments.sourceMdx: This is a library to keep a close eye on and one that could well compete with Tailwind: it integrates better with the target frameworks and doesn't force you to use a lengthy `className`.
segments.translated_content: 这是一款值得密切关注的库，有望与Tailwind竞争：它能更好地与目标框架集成，且无需强制使用冗长的`className`。

segments.content:
* 👀 [State of React - Survey Preview](https://github.com/Devographics/surveys/issues/85#issuecomment-1586439053): design of the new React survey is almost complete. You can have a [preview](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-react/2023) and give feedback.
* 👀 [Lee Robinson - "Dev server performance is our top priority"](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1671260151347830784): Next.js' dev server app dir has been criticised for its slowness, but Vercel plans to remedy this.
* 👀 [Remix - Dev Server v2 is now stable](https://twitter.com/pcattori/status/1669828506044203008): can be activated in v1 with a flag.
* 👀 [MDX - new GitHub syntax highlighting](https://twitter.com/wooorm/status/1671159366085672968)
* 👀 [MDX - new playground options](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1669332176431894533)
* 📊 [Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2023](https://survey.stackoverflow.co/2023/): as expected, React remains the most widely used web framework this year and Next.js has moved up the rankings.
* 💬 [Gatsby RFC - Adapters](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/38231): a new type of plugin to adapt the build to a deployment platform (Vercel, Netlify...) regarding caching, headers, redirects...
* 📖 [Improved Next.js image docs](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1670815761508581376)
* 📜 [Introduction to Next.js Server Actions](https://makerkit.dev/blog/tutorials/nextjs-server-actions): great overview of Server Actions in Next.js 13.4. TIL that they can be invoked from a button.
* 📜 [Introducing Isograph](https://isograph.substack.com/p/introducing-isograph): Robert Balicki (ex Relay) shares the POC of a new GraphQL client for React based on the concept of resolvers.
* 📜 [SpiderMonkey Newsletter - Firefox 114-115](https://spidermonkey.dev/blog/2023/06/09/newsletter-firefox-114-115.html): Firefox devs announced that they are working on optimisations for frameworks such as React. With Firefox 115, [all browsers now support Change Array By Copy](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1671166785738133505), a new ES2023 feature super useful to update your React state.
* 📜 [React Admin June 2023 Update](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/06/13/react-admin-june-2023-update.html): presents a fine list of features introduced over the last 3 months.
* 📜 [Ryan Bigg - Rails 7, React, TypeScript, ESBuild and View Components](https://ryanbigg.com/2023/06/rails-7-react-typescript-setup): explain how to manually integrate React into a Rails app. SPA mode, or with several entry points.
* 📜 [Replay for Test Suites](https://blog.replay.io/replay-for-test-suites): the time-travel debugging tool integrates with Cypress and raises $13m.
* 📜 [Storybook - New API references, TypeScript code snippets, and docs DX](https://storybook.js.org/blog/docs-updates/)
* 📜 [A Visual Guide to Layouts in Next.js 13](https://www.builder.io/blog/layouts-in-nextjs-13-visual)
* 📜 [Building a `<Button>` in React](https://catjam.fi/articles/ultimate-button-component)
* 📜 [Test your React hooks with Vitest efficiently](https://mayashavin.com/articles/test-react-hooks-with-vitest)
* 📜 [Add Prisma to a Remix app](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-prisma)
* 📦 [Docusaurus v3 alpha - MDX 2 + React 18](https://twitter.com/docusaurus/status/1669370649326895105)
* 📦 [Vercel AI SDK](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-the-vercel-ai-sdk)
* 📦 [React Wrap Balancer v1.0 - now uses the native CSS feature](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1669602326481387522)
* 📦 [OpenNext 2.0 - revamped ISR support](https://twitter.com/fanjiewang/status/1670941900302368768)
* 📦 [Fresh 1.2 – welcoming a full-time maintainer, sharing state between islands...](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.2)
* 📦 [Melange 1.0 - compiles OCaml / Reason to JavaScript](https://buttondown.email/anmonteiro/archive/melange-hits-v10/)
* 📦 [Waku 0.12](https://twitter.com/dai_shi/status/1670650381762961408)
* 🎥 [Are React client components bad?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6jM_0wDOw4g)
* 🎥 [React Summit 2023 - Youtube Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNBNS7NRGKME880lcYdw9QwkCiDYQFgCK)

segments.translated_content:
- 👀 [React 现状调查 - 预览版](https://github.com/Devographics/surveys/issues/85#issuecomment-1586439053): 新版 React 调查问卷设计接近完成。您可以查看[预览](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-react/2023)并提供反馈。
- 👀 [Lee Robinson - "开发服务器性能是我们的首要任务"](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1671260151347830784): Next.js 的应用目录开发服务器因速度慢受到批评，但 Vercel 计划改进这一问题。
- 👀 [Remix - 开发服务器 v2 现已稳定](https://twitter.com/pcattori/status/1669828506044203008): 在 v1 中可通过标志启用。
- 👀 [MDX - 新的 GitHub 语法高亮](https://twitter.com/wooorm/status/1671159366085672968)
- 👀 [MDX - 新的 Playground 选项](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1669332176431894533)
- 📊 [Stack Overflow 开发者调查 2023](https://survey.stackoverflow.co/2023/): 如预期，React 仍是今年最广泛使用的 Web 框架，Next.js 排名上升。
- 💬 [Gatsby RFC - 适配器](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/38231): 一种新型插件，用于根据部署平台（Vercel、Netlify 等）调整构建，涉及缓存、标头、重定向等。
- 📖 [改进的 Next.js 图片文档](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1670815761508581376)
- 📜 [Next.js 服务器操作简介](https://makerkit.dev/blog/tutorials/nextjs-server-actions): 对 Next.js 13.4 中服务器操作的全面概述。今日学习：可通过按钮调用它们。
- 📜 [Isograph 介绍](https://isograph.substack.com/p/introducing-isograph): Robert Balicki（前 Relay 成员）分享了一个基于解析器概念的新 GraphQL React 客户端 POC。
- 📜 [SpiderMonkey 通讯 - Firefox 114-115](https://spidermonkey.dev/blog/2023/06/09/newsletter-firefox-114-115.html): Firefox 开发者宣布正在优化 React 等框架的性能。Firefox 115 中，[所有浏览器现已支持 Change Array By Copy](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1671166785738133505)，这是 ES2023 的一项新特性，对更新 React 状态非常有用。
- 📜 [React Admin 2023 年 6 月更新](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/06/13/react-admin-june-2023-update.html): 列出了过去三个月引入的一系列功能。
- 📜 [Ryan Bigg - Rails 7、React、TypeScript、ESBuild 和 View Components](https://ryanbigg.com/2023/06/rails-7-react-typescript-setup): 详解如何手动将 React 集成到 Rails 应用中。支持 SPA 模式或多入口点。
- 📜 [测试套件的回放功能](https://blog.replay.io/replay-for-test-suites): 时间旅行调试工具与 Cypress 集成，并融资 1300 万美元。
- 📜 [Storybook - 新的 API 参考、TypeScript 代码片段和文档开发体验](https://storybook.js.org/blog/docs-updates/)
- 📜 [Next.js 13 布局可视化指南](https://www.builder.io/blog/layouts-in-nextjs-13-visual)
- 📜 [在 React 中构建一个 `<Button>`](https://catjam.fi/articles/ultimate-button-component)
- 📜 [高效使用 Vitest 测试 React Hooks](https://mayashavin.com/articles/test-react-hooks-with-vitest)
- 📜 [在 Remix 应用中添加 Prisma](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-prisma)
- 📦 [Docusaurus v3 alpha - MDX 2 + React 18](https://twitter.com/docusaurus/status/1669370649326895105)
- 📦 [Vercel AI SDK](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-the-vercel-ai-sdk)
- 📦 [React Wrap Balancer v1.0 - 现使用原生 CSS 特性](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1669602326481387522)
- 📦 [OpenNext 2.0 - 改进的 ISR 支持](https://twitter.com/fanjiewang/status/1670941900302368768)
- 📦 [Fresh 1.2 – 迎来全职维护者，支持岛屿间状态共享...](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.2)
- 📦 [Melange 1.0 - 将 OCaml / Reason 编译为 JavaScript](https://buttondown.email/anmonteiro/archive/melange-hits-v10/)
- 📦 [Waku 0.12](https://twitter.com/dai_shi/status/1670650381762961408)
- 🎥 [React 客户端组件不好吗？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6jM_0wDOw4g)
- 🎥 [React Summit 2023 - YouTube 播放列表](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNBNS7NRGKME880lcYdw9QwkCiDYQFgCK)

segments.content: Bring React components into the design process and let designers prototype with the same elements that you use to build the end product.
segments.sourceMdx: Bring React components into the design process and let designers prototype with the same elements that you use to build the end product.
segments.translated_content: 将React组件引入设计流程，让设计师使用与最终产品相同的元素进行原型设计。

segments.content: Remove the disconnect between design & code and release products faster!
segments.sourceMdx: Remove the disconnect between design & code and release products faster!
segments.translated_content: 消除设计与代码之间的脱节，加速产品发布！
[尝试使用UXPin Merge进行组件驱动式原型设计。](https://www.uxpin.com/merge/developers?utm_source=partnerships&utm_medium=partner&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_newsletter_merge_for_devs_05_23)

segments.content: **[React Native 0.72 - Symlink Support, Better Errors, and more](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/0.72-metro-package-exports-symlinks)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[React Native 0.72 - Symlink Support, Better Errors, and more](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/0.72-metro-package-exports-symlinks)**
segments.translated_content: **[React Native 0.72 - 符号链接支持、更佳错误提示等](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/0.72-metro-package-exports-symlinks)**

segments.content: After several Golden RCs, the latest version of React-Native has finally been released and will shortly be used in the Expo 49 SDK. There are quite a few improvements mentioned (DX, Hermes, performance...) and some breaking changes. I particularly like these 2 new features in the Metro bundler:
segments.sourceMdx: After several Golden RCs, the latest version of React-Native has finally been released and will shortly be used in the Expo 49 SDK. There are quite a few improvements mentioned (DX, Hermes, performance...) and some breaking changes. I particularly like these 2 new features in the Metro bundler:
segments.translated_content: 经过多个Golden RC版本后，React-Native最新版本终于发布，并将很快应用于Expo 49 SDK中。该版本包含诸多改进（开发者体验、Hermes引擎、性能优化等）和一些破坏性变更。其中Metro打包器的两项新特性尤为亮眼：

segments.content:
* Symlinks (beta): long-awaited feature to simplify monorepo and pnpm support
* [Package Exports](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/package-exports-support) (beta): better encapsulation of libs, compatibility with the rest of the frontend ecosystem and ability to expose a specific React-Native entry point.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Symlinks (beta): long-awaited feature to simplify monorepo and pnpm support
- [Package Exports](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/package-exports-support) (beta): better encapsulation of libs, compatibility with the rest of the frontend ecosystem and ability to expose a specific React-Native entry point.
segments.translated_content:
- 符号链接（测试版）：期待已久的功能，简化monorepo和pnpm支持
- [包导出](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/06/21/package-exports-support)（测试版）：更好的库封装性，与前端生态兼容，并能指定React-Native入口点

segments.content:
* 📜 [Environment Variables in React Native: The Right Way](https://elazizi.com/posts/environment-variables-in-react-native-the-right-way/): great article on typesafe management of environment variables in the Expo context.
* 💬 [New Renderer Interop Layer](https://twitter.com/cortinico/status/1671089178107363329): with RN v0.72, an experimental interop layer allows legacy React-Native components to be used with the new Fabric renderer. This enables an incremental adoption of the new architecture.
* 💬 [Upcoming changes for libraries in React Native 0.73 - Android](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/issues/671): you will need to add a namespace to the Gradle build.
* 👀 [React-Native macOS 0.71 - New Architecture on init template](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/pull/1853)
* 👀 [1/5 of the top 100 Medical apps in the App Store use React Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1671171049336221697)
* 👀 [Expo Updates - upcoming Brotli compression support](https://twitter.com/JI/status/1671368239463690240)
* 📦 [react-native-colo-loco 1.1 - Colocate native and js code](https://twitter.com/jamonholmgren/status/1671009094545846273)
* 📦 [react-native-mmkv 2.9 - RN 0.73 support](https://twitter.com/mrousavy/status/1671127232113266689)
* 📦 [Maestro 1.29](https://twitter.com/mobile__dev/status/1670940310460043266)
* 🎙️ [RNR 269 - React Native VisionCamera v3 with Marc Rousavy](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-269-react-native-visioncamera-v3-with-marc-rousavy)
segments.sourceMdx:
- 📜 [Environment Variables in React Native: The Right Way](https://elazizi.com/posts/environment-variables-in-react-native-the-right-way/): great article on typesafe management of environment variables in the Expo context.
- 💬 [New Renderer Interop Layer](https://twitter.com/cortinico/status/1671089178107363329): with RN v0.72, an experimental interop layer allows legacy React-Native components to be used with the new Fabric renderer. This enables an incremental adoption of the new architecture.
- 💬 [Upcoming changes for libraries in React Native 0.73 - Android](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/issues/671): you will need to add a namespace to the Gradle build.
- 👀 [React-Native macOS 0.71 - New Architecture on init template](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/pull/1853)
- 👀 [1/5 of the top 100 Medical apps in the App Store use React Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1671171049336221697)
- 👀 [Expo Updates - upcoming Brotli compression support](https://twitter.com/JI/status/1671368239463690240)
- 📦 [react-native-colo-loco 1.1 - Colocate native and js code](https://twitter.com/jamonholmgren/status/1671009094545846273)
- 📦 [react-native-mmkv 2.9 - RN 0.73 support](https://twitter.com/mrousavy/status/1671127232113266689)
- 📦 [Maestro 1.29](https://twitter.com/mobile__dev/status/1670940310460043266)
- 🎙️ [RNR 269 - React Native VisionCamera v3 with Marc Rousavy](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-269-react-native-visioncamera-v3-with-marc-rousavy)
segments.translated_content:
- 📜 [React Native环境变量：正确使用方式](https://elazizi.com/posts/environment-variables-in-react-native-the-right-way/)：关于Expo环境下类型安全的环境变量管理的精彩文章。
- 💬 [新渲染器互操作层](https://twitter.com/cortinico/status/1671089178107363329)：RN v0.72中，实验性互操作层允许旧版React-Native组件与新Fabric渲染器配合使用，支持新架构的渐进式迁移。
- 💬 [React Native 0.73库的即将变更 - Android](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/issues/671)：需在Gradle构建中添加命名空间。
- 👀 [React-Native macOS 0.71 - 初始化模板支持新架构](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/pull/1853)
- 👀 [App Store医疗类Top100应用中1/5使用React Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1671171049336221697)

🧑‍💼 [**Passionfroot - 高级全栈工程师（Remix） - €160k+，柏林/远程**](https://passionfroot.recruitee.com/o/senior-fullstack-engineer)

segments.content: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.sourceMdx: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.translated_content: Passionfroot的使命是通过YouTube、播客、社交媒体和新闻通讯赋能未来的独立创业者。加入我们，共同打造一个工具，助力全球内容创作者建立可扩展、可持续的业务。

segments.content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.sourceMdx: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.translated_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 高级React Native开发工程师 - 完全远程，B2B合同月薪净额2.1-3.2万波兰兹罗提**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.sourceMdx: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.translated_content: 您想参与全球最热门应用的开发吗？您是否愿意共同塑造React Native技术的未来？加入Callstack这个由React和React Native技术领袖组成的团队。详情请访问我们的网站。我们期待您的申请——请尽情展示您的才华！

segments.content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is \~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe\_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.sourceMdx: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.translated_content: 我们正在招聘多位专注于React Native的开发者！年薪约16万美元外加10%奖金。应聘者需具备RN实际项目经验且居住在美国。私信[@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i)了解更多信息，并请提及This Week in React。
